texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've  written about keto  before on the blog, but as we approach the end of 2022 and many people are making resolutions for the new year, I get a lot of questions about it. Hopefully I can answer most of those here!
texts.text: I've  written about keto  before on the blog, but as we approach the end of 2022 and many people are making resolutions for the new year, I get a lot of questions about it. Hopefully I can answer most of those here!

texts.label: title
texts.orig: What is keto?
texts.text: What is keto?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Ketogenic diets  often sound complicated. The  TL;DR  is:
texts.text: Ketogenic diets  often sound complicated. The  TL;DR  is:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Reduce your intake of carbohydrates to a very low level (less than 30g/day for most people)
texts.text: Reduce your intake of carbohydrates to a very low level (less than 30g/day for most people)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Increase your fat and protein intake to make up the difference
texts.text: Increase your fat and protein intake to make up the difference

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Seriously. That's it.
texts.text: Seriously. That's it.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: But before we go any further:
texts.text: But before we go any further:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: 🩺  Don't start (or stop) a ketogenic diet without talking to a trusted medical professional. There are certain health conditions that require modifications to the common ketogenic diet.
texts.text: 🩺  Don't start (or stop) a ketogenic diet without talking to a trusted medical professional. There are certain health conditions that require modifications to the common ketogenic diet.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: In my experience, adopting a keto lifestyle helped me to:
texts.text: In my experience, adopting a keto lifestyle helped me to:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Maintain a steady blood glucose all day long (about 100 mg/dL)
texts.text: Maintain a steady blood glucose all day long (about 100 mg/dL)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Reduce my weight (about 210 down to 170-175)
texts.text: Reduce my weight (about 210 down to 170-175)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Sleep better
texts.text: Sleep better

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Exercise longer[^exercise]
texts.text: Exercise longer[^exercise]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Balance my cholesterol levels
texts.text: Balance my cholesterol levels

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Lower my triglycerides and
texts.text: Lower my triglycerides and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Avoid diabetes
texts.text: Avoid diabetes

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Top three things you should know
texts.text: Top three things you should know

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've boiled down all of the questions I've answered via email, social media, and in person at various dinner parties when people question my unusual eating habits. 🤭
texts.text: I've boiled down all of the questions I've answered via email, social media, and in person at various dinner parties when people question my unusual eating habits. 🤭

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you have questions that aren't answered here, click one of the links on my  profile page  and send me your question!
texts.text: If you have questions that aren't answered here, click one of the links on my  profile page  and send me your question!

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: What do I need to buy?
texts.text: What do I need to buy?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This is an easy one.  Nothing.
texts.text: This is an easy one.  Nothing.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You'll find  tons  of products online and at your local store with "keto" on the label. If you flip them over and read the ingredients, they're chock full of artificial sweeteners, flour substitutes, and chemicals. Although many of these won't spike your blood sugar, many of them will! Some artificial sweeteners, like malitol, have the same effect as raw sugar, just on a smaller scale.
texts.text: You'll find  tons  of products online and at your local store with "keto" on the label. If you flip them over and read the ingredients, they're chock full of artificial sweeteners, flour substitutes, and chemicals. Although many of these won't spike your blood sugar, many of them will! Some artificial sweeteners, like malitol, have the same effect as raw sugar, just on a smaller scale.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: All of these artificial foods push your keto progress backwards.
texts.text: All of these artificial foods push your keto progress backwards.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You do not need keto shakes, keto fat bombs, or keto vitamins. You do not need gluten-free foods as they're packed with carbohydrates.
texts.text: You do not need keto shakes, keto fat bombs, or keto vitamins. You do not need gluten-free foods as they're packed with carbohydrates.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You need whole foods. You need high quality fats, proteins, and lower-carb vegetables and fruits.
texts.text: You need whole foods. You need high quality fats, proteins, and lower-carb vegetables and fruits.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The only exception I'll give here is that you need some high quality electrolytes, especially as you start on keto. As your body transitions from burning easily accessible glucose in your blood to burning fat, you'll find that your salt intake will be woefully insufficient. You can make your own keto electrolytes really easily (tons of recipes available online) or find electrolyte tables/mixes without sugar.
texts.text: The only exception I'll give here is that you need some high quality electrolytes, especially as you start on keto. As your body transitions from burning easily accessible glucose in your blood to burning fat, you'll find that your salt intake will be woefully insufficient. You can make your own keto electrolytes really easily (tons of recipes available online) or find electrolyte tables/mixes without sugar.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: How do I handle going out to eat?
texts.text: How do I handle going out to eat?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Here's a big challenge. Your friends invite you to dinner or the holidays have arrived. How do you handle it?
texts.text: Here's a big challenge. Your friends invite you to dinner or the holidays have arrived. How do you handle it?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: My strategy involves the following:
texts.text: My strategy involves the following:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Get a look at the menu ahead of time.'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Get a look at the menu ahead of time.'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Have an answer ready if people ask about your menu choices.'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Have an answer ready if people ask about your menu choices.'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Never say that you "can\'t have" something.'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Never say that you "can\'t have" something.'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Save up your carbs.'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Save up your carbs.'>]

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Key takeaway: Your diet is your choice. It's the same situation with someone who doesn't drink but their friends keep offering them alcohol. Don't let anyone pressure you into changing your goals.
texts.text: Key takeaway: Your diet is your choice. It's the same situation with someone who doesn't drink but their friends keep offering them alcohol. Don't let anyone pressure you into changing your goals.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: What happens if I eat something I shouldn't?
texts.text: What happens if I eat something I shouldn't?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The holidays are coming! 😱
texts.text: The holidays are coming! 😱

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: First off, admit that mistakes happen. That's okay!
texts.text: First off, admit that mistakes happen. That's okay!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: When I've eaten tons of carbs, I make a mental plan for the next day to get back on track. Some argue that starting the next day with a fast makes the most sense. I prefer to get back to my high fat and moderate protein foods the next day as I normally would.
texts.text: When I've eaten tons of carbs, I make a mental plan for the next day to get back on track. Some argue that starting the next day with a fast makes the most sense. I prefer to get back to my high fat and moderate protein foods the next day as I normally would.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Keep in mind, though, that once you've done keto for a good while (usually 1-2 months for me), your digestive system has adapted to the new diet. Lots of the bacteria you used to have on a high carbohydrate diet are gone. Flooding the digestive system with lots of high carb food will make your intestines confused. Confused intestines are not comfortable. 🚽
texts.text: Keep in mind, though, that once you've done keto for a good while (usually 1-2 months for me), your digestive system has adapted to the new diet. Lots of the bacteria you used to have on a high carbohydrate diet are gone. Flooding the digestive system with lots of high carb food will make your intestines confused. Confused intestines are not comfortable. 🚽

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Remind yourself of why you started the keto diet, get back to eating right, and take it as a learning lesson.
texts.text: Remind yourself of why you started the keto diet, get back to eating right, and take it as a learning lesson.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Sometimes I see a delicious high carb food, like pizza, and I think:
texts.text: Sometimes I see a delicious high carb food, like pizza, and I think:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: "That looks so good. But if I eat that, I'm going to have belly problems for two days. Is it worth it?
texts.text: "That looks so good. But if I eat that, I'm going to have belly problems for two days. Is it worth it?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I make myself think through the consequences before I eat it. Do I still eat it sometimes? I do. 🤷‍♂️
texts.text: I make myself think through the consequences before I eat it. Do I still eat it sometimes? I do. 🤷‍♂️

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Wrapping up
texts.text: Wrapping up

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Going keto delivered tons of benefits for me, but it certainly is not easy. However, the diet is fully open source and nobody needs to buy anything special to get started. You can still go out to eat with friends and recover from dieting errors easily.
texts.text: Going keto delivered tons of benefits for me, but it certainly is not easy. However, the diet is fully open source and nobody needs to buy anything special to get started. You can still go out to eat with friends and recover from dieting errors easily.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: [^exercise]: At first, exercise will feel more difficult. Be patient and take it slow as you start.
texts.text: [^exercise]: At first, exercise will feel more difficult. Be patient and take it slow as you start.
